paper.title: Improvements on the Disease Migration Model
paper.abstract: The number of aging populations and chronic disease patients has increased continuously in China. The increasing trend leads to public health problems and heavy financial burden in the society. To counter these problems, an early intervention approach is needed. Disease Migration Model (DMM) takes the subject's current health status and medical historical data as input and predicts future disease migration. DMM, as a prediction model, could be useful in disease early treatment. In this study, we propose an integrated DMM system based on XGBoost machine learning algorithm. With health screening data and living habits as input, our DMM model could predict future disease risk. Besides, we implement a feature selection module and data imputation module to improve system performance and robustness. In a preliminary test, we show that the above improvements can increase the hypertension prediction accuracy to 85%.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要研究基于机器学习的疾病迁移模型，用于预测未来疾病风险，其应用领域为公共卫生和医疗健康，并未涉及衍生品定价、金融风险管理或投资组合管理等金融领域。
